website_summaries.verdict: Protective layer to put on your hardwood floors after cleaning them with another product.
pros: Users are wowed by the glass-like shine on floors after using this protective polish
Hides small scratches and makes floors look new again
For many, shine lasts about 6 months
Bonus points for working on all hardwood types in addition to stone tile
cons: You must vacuum and clean floor first, and not step on it for 30 minutes after using

website_summaries.verdict: Puts shine to your floors that makes the scratches less noticeable.
pros: Does not need to be diluted
Also works on laminate and stone
The gloss tends to last longer than some other products
Easy squirt on and wipe down application
cons: Works well, but can be a little pricey if you have a lot of flooring to restore

customer_reviews.title: An excellent top coat shine for your hardwood
customer_reviews.text: I won’t drone on about this or that... it’s just an excellent easy to use resealer and shine improver. Yes it fills in light scratches. Yes it feels slippery with clean socks on. Yes it helps the floor stay cleaner afterwards. Yes it’s easy to put on. Two tips. 1. Clean your floor really well by hand. Scrub it clean wipe it up by hand. 2. Get on your hands an knees and apply this with cotton rags. It just creates a better result to do it by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Scott J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: There's a way to remove products if you hate the new look like me
customer_reviews.text: My wood floors is not high gloss look. But after use I ended up with very glossy wood floors with patches of white bubble mark - it looks like manicure on wood floor. Some people like it, but I didn't like the look at all. Fortunately, there's a way to remove them and Weiman sent me a removal direction (i.e use diluted ammonia solution in detail). I followed the direction and most of them were gone so far, but I might have to keep working on them. So if you don't like the look, contact Weiman for advice removal instruction before trying other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Mirrorlike Floors After Repeated Applications
customer_reviews.text: On laminate flooring that had absolutely no shine, this product has created a highly reflective surface. But, please note, it took six applications to achieve it. Pay close attention to the directions. The floor must be really clean/dustfree, and one has to frequently change whatever cloths one uses to apply the liquid. Allow each "layer" to dry thoroughly, which may mean two or more hours wait time. I actually allowed an overnight between two of the applications. Terrific results but a helluva lot of work.
customer_reviews.author: Notinsync

customer_reviews.title: Brought Laminate Flooring Back From The Dead!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased new home 1 month ago; has gorgeous 24'x24' great room but laminate flooring was dull, disgusting, streaky appearance. Planned to rip up and replace however researched this product that stated use on laminate floors. Prepped flooring as directed and put down 2 coats and the WOW FACTOR happened! Super, gorgeous flooring returned. Finish is unreal; honestly looks like new flooring. Nice, hard finish - you can see that it's stronger than most "wax flooring" products out there on the market. Extremely thrilled with purchase. Already have my friends and family purchasing this product to do over their dull laminate flooring. Thank you so very much for making such a remarkable product!
customer_reviews.author: moosefor2

customer_reviews.title: NEW again!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Weiman's Wood Floor Polish and Restorer as a last-ditch effort before calling someone in to refinish my wood floors. I can't sing enough praise for this product. I have probably purchased every other product on the market to bring life back into my scratched, dull, lifeless floors without success. First coat with Weiman's and my floors look magnificent. I can only imagine how great they will look with a second coat. Thanks for carrying this Amazon! I could not find it anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had paid more attention to the negative reviews of this product. When I first used it, I thought the shine looked good. I later saw where some of it had splattered on an untreated area of flooring and went to wipe it up. It doesn't not come up. Three days after application, I have scuff marks and scratches that I didn't have before. The scuff looking marks do not come off. This is essentially like putting a thin layer of shellac on your wood floors. The scratches are on the layer(one coat) of this product. If you have good floors, you don't want to do this! Taking it off is a project.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I found hardwood floors under carpet in the forclosed/flipped house we bought. We used their cleaner and this polish and the results were nothing short of amazing! After applying the polish and waiting 30 minutes I came back and the floor was so shiny I thought it was still wet!!! Cannot recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: K. E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Floor Polish!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 1960’s vintage hardwood floors, that have some “age character”. These floors have seen even more ware and tear since our two year old setter pup has been a part of our lives, and the product I was using is no longer available. I was concerned that this product might not work well on floors this old. NO PROBLEM. I have just used this floor polish and they look beautiful. The product was very easy to use and I will give it six stars if I find that the shine lasts a long time. Great to find something that works so well!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Leaves water spots
customer_reviews.text: I tried this because it was cheaper than similar products that I have been using for years. It goes on nice and looks good. Fter the floor dries, you can not let any water splash on the floor without wiping and drying immediately. We have dogs who often drip water near thier bowls. Any water with leave a whits, translucent stain that will never go away. We had to wait until the finish completely wore away before refinishing. We never had this problem with other product, only this one
customer_reviews.author: Catherine L

customer_reviews.title: Not for oil rubbed floors
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t work for oil rubbed floors. It will leave a shiny sheen on them so you can’t use it on that type of floor. It was hard to tell from the questions / comments so I want to warn other buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa8631

customer_reviews.title: Best polish I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many different wood floor cleaners and polish and this weiman product is by far my favorite. I use it every 3 months in high traffic areas like kitchen, bathrooms and laundry room and once a year in bedrooms and other areas that have rugs and just don’t have constant traffic. It keeps floors looking absolutely perfect. The high gloss look is a bit shiny for the first week but it does balance out after about a week, as I prefer a matte finish.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Try it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product: worked miracles on my apartment's old, unevenly-stained, "dead-looking" wood floors. They really needed serious sanding/staining/varnishing but I couldn't get into something so involved (and expensive) so I did some research and several articles mentioned Weiman's floor polish. It WORKS beautifully! Super-easy to apply, dries very quickly, doesn't leave greasy/sticky/slippery finish, NO chemical smell, safe for children & pets. What more could you ask? Applied either 2 or 3 coats on high-traffic areas (cleaned & scrubbed as much as I could beforehand) and they ended up with a lovely soft shine...wood is very grateful when you give it some TLC. Got a kick out of the comment from one reviewer who "wanted to MARRY Weiman...". Absolutely right!
customer_reviews.author: New York EMR

customer_reviews.title: Best Hardwood Product EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This. Stuff. Is. GREAT! It creates sort of a Candy coating on your hardwood; is the best way I can describe it. Vacuum and mop then use this and it makes your floors so shiny it may hurt your eyes if the sun hits just right! A little goes a long way but I used 2 coats and my husband said he almost slipped and fell in socks because he wasn’t expecting the floor to be so slick (in a good way!). I love this stuff!!! Oh, and the “candy coating” lasts weeks!!
customer_reviews.author: Chance Glover

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly if you clean and apply correctly
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm! First vacuumed and swept with a microfiber cloth, then cleaned with the Weiman cleaner. Let it dry for an hour. Applied the polish with a dry swiffer style microfiber mop, and let that dry for an hour before applying second coat. The bottle says 30-45 minutes is enough, but I'd rather over dry than not enough. Looked good after first coat, looked GREAT after second coat. Three coats probably would've been too much sheen. I think your results will depend on how well you cleaned beforehand and how well you applied the polish. Amazing results- the floor looks brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Wood Floor Polish
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several wood floor cleaners and polishers and have been very disappointed with the results. I searched Amazon and found this product. I highly recommend it! It brought back a nice sheen to our otherwise dull looking wood floors. Initially, I kept seeing streaks under certain light conditions. I decided to apply the product on my mop (flat) directly instead of the floor and solved the problem. You need to put enough of the product to get the shine you want. Don't soak your mop but don't skimp either. Mop along the wood grain using a continuous motion. You'll see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Don't use on bamboo floors
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews said this worked on bamboo floors but it does not. It actually made the scratches worse. Also if you have pets it may be impossible to remove all hair from floor before applying and the hair gets stuck under the polish. It started to come up after only one cleaning and started to clump/get hazy. My floors look worse now than before I tried to polish them. Steer clear of this for bamboo floors!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Perdue

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressive results
customer_reviews.text: Have no clue at this time how long the shine will last but my floors look great at the moment. I’ll try to remember to update this review in a few months. My 30 year old floors were dull and showing a great deal of small scratches. Two coats and they look new. I tried the Bona version of this product a few years ago and don’t remember being very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Brought back the hardwood to almost natural look.
customer_reviews.text: Omg, I love this product. There was a carpet over a hardwood floor in my bedroom. I had a waterbed, yes believe it or not. A dog put a hole in it, water all over. So out went the bed and carpet. Well, then I find white paint all over the hardwood floor. I found this great stuff to take it up, but between this and the water the hardwood looked awful. I used this and wow what a difference, beautiful shine and brought the color back. Everyone can’t believe that’s all I did. It says I can use another coat if I want, still thinking about it but great the way it is now.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: This product worked great on my light colored oak floors.  They are shiny again.
customer_reviews.text: This really worked great on my light colored oak hardwood floors. I had them refinished about 8 years ago, and the refinisher told me never to put water on them and to use Bona to clean. I went to order some from Amazon, and this came up as an alternative and had a higher rating so I decided to try it. I'm very glad I did. Bona did not leave my floor shiny and this product left them noticeably shiny and much better looking. I had no problem with streaking and cleaned the floor in the direction of the grain. Hope this helps others.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperMJ

customer_reviews.title: Brightened a Tired Old Floor
customer_reviews.text: I heard great reviews from a friend who used this product. I am selling an old home and the wood floors had been refinished over 20 ears ago. There were lots of scuffs, traffic areas, chair scrapes, and worn finish. After a good cleaning I applied Weiman Wood Floor Polish and Restorer, about an hour of dry time I came back to behold my work and was blown away by the results. The floor really brightened up with the damaged areas blending in and feeling more like a nice patina. It's not perfect and that wasn't the expectation, but the results restored a beautiful old floor.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn G. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Best Floor Product I've Ever Purchased
customer_reviews.text: I was absolutely fretting about having to refinish my hardwood floors! The house we live in is 39 years old and the floors honestly probably hadn't been refinished or protected outside of the initial install. We've lived here for 9 years and have several kids and pets and the floors were dull and etched/ scratched down to raw wood in some places. Due to this, even directly after mopping, our floors still held dirt. While I know this product won't negate the eventuality of refinishing, I am totally in awe of what this product has accomplished. It's even held up is gloss after several weeks of continued heavy traffic.
customer_reviews.author: RedHedd

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shine
customer_reviews.text: My hardwood floors were looking dull. I live at the beach with 3 dogs so the floors take quite a bit of abuse. I have used just about everything in the stores so I had nothing to loose with trying this. I cleaned the floor and applied this product and the shine was remarkable. My floors look like they are still wet. I can not give any feed back on how long the shine will last as of yet, however. Most other products only last until the next cleaning or at most for 3-5 days . So far, the shine has held up for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me!!!
customer_reviews.text: 7/21/2020: Was a bit skittish on using this, or another popular brand, after reading other reviews. However, after cleaning my hardwood floor, I applied per instructions. I only used one coat and got good results on my dark floors. I applied the "high-traffic" type so not sure how the long-term results will be. Btw, I cleaned with a floor cleaner, rinsed, and applied product, taking care to remove any obvious stains, dirt, and grease beforehand. No smell or stickiness but I did wait several hours before walking on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Shine - Yes  Corrective Measures - No
customer_reviews.text: This product will provide a nice shine to a floor in great condition, but it did not provide any corrective measures to scratches or dullness from usage. So if you have a floor in good condition and want a higher gloss to it this product will work. If your floor is not in good condition this product will not make it any better. I just used the product so I can't give an opinion as to how long this shine will last. Hopefully, it does something as it advertises and maintains the shine for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I use to use Woodpecker Smart Shine but it’s like $40 per 32oz bottle and I used a full bottle to do my floors. This is much cheaper and works exactly the same. Before I found this stuff I tried Bona... what a mistake!! The buildup was horrible and it made my floors look dirty. Had to scrape all the Bona buildup off by hand with ammonia and a scraper.
customer_reviews.author: Pam VanKomen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shine
customer_reviews.text: Did my floors yesterday-large living room, two hallways, and dining room with one bottle. My floors, 24 hours later, are shiny and beautiful. I have not polished them in ten years. It's amazing how wonderful they look. I hope the shine will last for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Wow! What a cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I love all of the Weiman products, from polishing cabinets, cleaning stainless appliances in the kitchen, to mopping floors--they are exceptional! I just polished my wood floors and they look like brand new, I cannot express how beautiful my dull,ordinary floors look, I have to stop every time I pass by now and just beam at how extraordinary they look. It's only been a week since I used it on the floors, but they still look like they just dried!
customer_reviews.author: Amajan

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: This made my floor shiny but it feels tacky. Like it’s ok with socks on but in bare feet it feels sticky. I have anti scratch pads on the bottom of my chairs and the chairs used to move freely when sitting on them. Now it’s so hard to move your chair you hav to get off of it to pull your chair into the table. Application was also a bit challenging as you need to be careful to cover every inch of floor but not overlap. Wouldn’t use this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work well for me
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I’m using this product. I know pictures used to advertise a product can be “misleading” sometimes. Even with that knowledge, I’m disappointed with the results. The Weimar Wood Floor Polish does make the floors shine but the scratch coverage was equally important to me. And the coverage is why the two stars because it covered some but not enough to eliminate all or even most of the scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you are not sure, give it a second chance.
customer_reviews.text: When I first used this product, I was totally disappointed. My wooden floor looked absolutely same before and after polishing. I was upset and decided to return. I thought what a heck, why don't I use it one more time before return. And I am glad I did. My floor looked finally shinny and well nourished. I decide to keep it. So, for those who out there thinking that this product is total waste of money, give it a second chance. It does work. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Posh88

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: My recliner damaged the floor below it from frequent movement. This polish restored it to its original state. Did take some preparation--I first thoroughly cleaned the floor twice using shark mop with built-in spray. Then let the floor dry. Then applied two coats of Weiman polish about 10 hours apart. Then gave it the rest of the day to dry. The following day, I woke-up to a beautiful, shiny, restored floor. Totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: BostonTech99

customer_reviews.title: Brand New
customer_reviews.text: My 70 year old floors that were refinished 20 years ago were in terrible condition! heavy traffic area as it’s the main room of my home. Scuff marks from chairs at the table, etc. We had gotten a quote to have them refinished again and it just wasn’t in the budget. I did some research on products and went with this based upon the recommendations and reviews of others. My floors look amazing! Really look like new! Scuff marks and scratches covered nicely. Our floors were very dirty and needed scrubbed clean before hand. I would say definitely make sure you do this! I am so pleased with my $13 solution and love my floors again!
customer_reviews.author: Mona R Capuano

customer_reviews.title: Be careful to apply in same room all at once
customer_reviews.text: This works! the floor shined, but takes a lot of effort to apply evenly. I had a lot of furniture so couldnt apply this in one go, had to move furniture to one side and put it on that side and then move furniture to other side of room and then apply this on that side, later we saw a visible difference in those two areas specially the border between two. might have to scrub it all down and reapply
customer_reviews.author: Dr. DoLittle

customer_reviews.title: Wow! I am a believer!
customer_reviews.text: Moved into a new house with hardwoods that were scratched from moving in and from our big dogs not being used to walking on them ... plus it was aged and dull. I was unsure what to do and finally my research led me to this product. First attempt TOTAL SUCCESS and the floors look like new again! Drying time is less than 30 minutes, and the finish looks like glass (which i totally love). This company obviously takes pride in its product lines and it really shows! Give it a try if you are on the fence!
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings...
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my floors, the shine is beautiful however 1: it should come in a spray bottle. 2: shows scratches very easily that dont normally show. 3: it is extremely difficult to het off, evern after multiple washes and steaming, in order to put a new coat on so i’m concerned about this over time and have chosen to just let the first Coat wear away itself before reappling again
customer_reviews.author: Lana L.

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used!
customer_reviews.text: First time using this brand but won't be the last! Very easy to use, covers scratches and imperfections extremely well. No trouble putting down a smooth even coat and it dries quickly. Best shine ever. I've used Bona for many years but the Weiman is much better in my opinion. I just used it this week so will have to wait to see how long it lasts
customer_reviews.author: Alabama Nana

customer_reviews.title: Amazing - it is too easy!!! And beautiful
customer_reviews.text: And SOOOO easy to use. I have a power floor cleaner with its own solution dispenser. So I squirted the Polish in Z pattern (per instructions) and used my power dual spin mop head to spread the polish. FAST, EASY and it looks awesome. I'm hoping to attach picture, wish I had a before shot. Our floors are distressed style hickory, matte finish.
customer_reviews.author: RGH

customer_reviews.title: Saved my floors
customer_reviews.text: My hardwood floor in my rental was pretty scratched and dull- when I put this on, my roommates noticed a difference immediately. Restored life to my floors and gave a protective coating to high traffic areas. I used it about a month ago and the floors are still shiny! Will 100% buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Used it on wood flooring that was refinished 12 years ago. The shine is noticeable and is almost completely non-slip, which was the intent of buying this product. Have used several other products to “wax” the floors but always with the same result-the floor was always slippery to walk on. Have used about a third of the bottle on about 350 square foot of flooring. Have recommended this to several friends. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Floor Polish for Hardwood Floors
customer_reviews.text: I have used a number of products on my hardwood floors and recently needed to pick up a new one. I use Weiman countertop cleaner almost daily so I figured I'd give their floor polish a try. This is by far the best (non-wax) floor polish I've used. It goes on easy and produces a high shine. One bottle does as much as two bottles of the expensive stuff from home depot. Weiman is my new go to product
customer_reviews.author: A. Amante

customer_reviews.title: Shine by the mile
customer_reviews.text: I have used another Brand of hardwood floor reviver and polish, but this product is by far better and easier to use. The cleaner did a great job, and the restorer/polish made my floor glow. In addition you don't have to wait 24 hours to replace your furniture, it dries and you can put your room back in order. Thank you Weimans
customer_reviews.author: Delaware Diva

customer_reviews.title: This is first product I've used that actually works!
customer_reviews.text: The floor polish leaves a beautiful shine, especially after the 2nd coat. It's so easy to use and looks like it was professionally done. It's simple to apply and doesn't have a strong smell. Also, I'm saving a bundle of money by doing it myself. Thanks to the Weiman family for making such an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: works great hiding scratches!
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased a new home with hardwood floors and was dismayed to discover scratch marks where the previous owner had a table and chairs. I used Weiman floor cleaner and polisher and was very happy with the results. Not on,y are our floors shinier, the scratch marks are hardly noticeable-- if at all. I applied it by hand in small sections. As a result, it took some time to apply the product...but definitely worth the trouble!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Stansel

customer_reviews.title: This is the shine you're looking for...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and thank you to all those who recommended this over Bona products which, like several others, I didnt have the best experience with. The shine is amazing and my floors are NOT slippery. I use this about once a month since we have high traffic in my home which is hardwood throughout just about the entire house. I use method products to mop the floors daily.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to use - squirt on, mop off
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with how easy this product was to use that I had to come back to write a review. You literally just squirt it on the floor, and use a mop to spread it around. I had pretty old engineered wood floors that haven't been treated in at least as long as I've owned the house. One coat of this makes them look shiny and new. I tried two coats and holy smokes it looks great. Next time around I'll get the two pack.
customer_reviews.author: Timskis6

customer_reviews.title: Love this wax!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of searching for a wax to use on my original hardwood floors that needed a lot of TLC. This wax has to be one of the best ones I’ve ever used. A little goes a long way and my floors shine like they never have before. I also use the Weiman hardwood cleaner. The only products I will use on my floors from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie W

customer_reviews.title: Hardwood floors look brand new!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly. I absolutely love this product! I used it on my hardwood floors that are 18 years old and they look brand new. High glossy shine, no extra residue, easy application. Nothing to complain about. I use this on my hardwood floors every six months to keep them looking new. One bit of advice, when you are done with the application, wash out your mop as soon as your are done applying the product. If you don’t, the product will dry on it, become hard and will never wash out, therefore making the mop unusable for the future. I made this mistake the first time I applied the product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Viviano

customer_reviews.title: Weiman is for Real
customer_reviews.text: Weiman wood floor polish did everything it said it would do! Wood flooring routinely cleaned with Bona but dings and drag marks at the front door (don’t ask me how) were very noticeable. Weiman wood cleaner restored the wood flooring to a lustrous shine, got rid of the drag marks and made the dings look like art!
customer_reviews.author: D. Green

customer_reviews.title: Cloudy Haze is what you get when you use this product.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst floor polish I’ve ever used. Now I have random white cloudy smeared sections (middle of photo) with no idea how to remove, other than it’s going to take me time to research and clean. NOT happy at all. Even if you spot check a section and don’t see any cloudy haze, once you get started, it shows up in random sections. Floor looks awful, especially for all the work of cleaning first, then going back to polish.
customer_reviews.author: DV

customer_reviews.title: Good polish
customer_reviews.text: Used this instead of Bona hardwood polish and was very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Hair Maven

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shine
customer_reviews.text: I have light hardwood floors. Great product as it doesn't alter the color of the hardwood floor. Only issue Doesn't repair all deep scratches, still noticeable, but better than before. One minor issue , maybe it is just me, is that can't glide on the floors when walking as it is not as "slippery" as before.
customer_reviews.author: H. Chow

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a beautiful gloss after two coats.
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this house with 13 year old maple hardwood in kitchen and dining. Wood in good condition but dull and no shine. Tried a swifter but didnt provide good results and tried another brand of hardwood cleaner but it left a dull finish. So, tried the Weimans after thoroughly cleaning the floor and the first coat was an amazing impriovement! Applied a second coat and it came out with a fabulous gloss. It enriched the colors of the hardwood and now we are proud if our floors.
customer_reviews.author: C. M .

customer_reviews.title: Did wonders on my well loved wood floors
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is like magic. The hardwood floors in my house have been well loved with scratches from dogs, my son’s toys, and all of the rocks that get dragged in from our crushed granite driveway. This restored them and filled in all the light scratches. Won’t cover up a gouge but makes it less noticeable. All you’ll be seeing is how new and shiny your floors look.
customer_reviews.author: edwin overton

customer_reviews.title: My Floors Now Shine Bright Like a Diamond!... like an ode to Rihanna
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for floors that you can almost see your reflection in, buy this product. If you are into the matte, flat, dull-finish look, this is not the product for you. Your floors will shine and glisten like a glass lake. As a phene for clean floors, I am 100% impressed with this product. I have found my new hardwood floor cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Great wood polish
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect initially but I really like the product. The product is more of a liquid rather than a cream so when dispersing onto the floor keep that in mind. It covers well and really brings a nice shine and luster to dull floors. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Aschliman

customer_reviews.title: Wowzer!! Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews and thought they had been written my Mr. Weiman and family. While have used Weiman products before and liked them this hardwood floor polish and restorer is an absolute winner! Easy to use and no streaks. I have a high traffic area that was really bad and had planned to use two and maybe even three coats. Nope, one was enough. Bad news is now I have to do the rest of the entire floor as the part I did looks like it’s been refinished so I will have to do it all to make it even. I can’t say how long this application will last but right now I couldn’t be happier. Nice job Weiman’s!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard R. Egbert

customer_reviews.title: just follow the instructions
customer_reviews.text: Hardly write reviews and have never put anything on the Bamboo floor laid in when bought the house and it's been about eight years and after a good cleaning the next day I swept up to make sure everything is clean I just to one of those cheap Swiffer looking mops with a flat pad and just follow the instructions. It worked amazingly! Minimum effort just put it on mop it in and I just kept going back over and over again till there was no excess left. The floors look great for the houses resale.
customer_reviews.author: Beloww

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous to use it because it said not to use it on un sealed wood. But I tested it in a small area and it was so shiny and beautiful. It’s like the floors got a facial. They are so smooth to walk on and shine so nice. I used the swifter mop pad for application and did one long row at a time to make sure the product was evenly distributed. If you miss a spot it’s noticeable because the undone part looks sandy and dusty compared to the done part. Be sure to whips up any random spills quickly to keep the floors even.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: This Weiman wood floor polish and restorer works great! This is the first time I buy and use the polish and restorer for my hardwood floors and it worked wonders. My floors are nice and shiny with minimal effort. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT! I bought new rugs and needed to clean the hardwood floors. Mopped, vacuumed, washed with oil soap and applied it, waited 45 minutes and put on a second coat. I can’t believe what this did for my 60 year old hardwood floors. They haven’t looked this good since I pulled up the wall to wall twenty years ago. And even the remnants of wiped up stains (I have 2 cats) looked so much better. Hides minor scratches which I have lots of. I am ordering more as I know this is something I will use several times a year, especially just before company comes! I highly recommend this polish.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Shiny!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using the Bono cleaner since we purchased our home and it always left a cloudy cover on the floors. After one use you could visibly see the floor was much shinier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This product is cheaper than a few other brands on the market and it's evident in the results. Waxing the floors with this product is like painting your walls with cheap paint. Multiple coats are required and still there is never complete uniformity. The main downfall is the mop marks; the coverage doesn't blend between strokes. Next time I wax I will purchase a higher-end product because it's worth spending extra for a quality finish.
customer_reviews.author: keno2003

customer_reviews.title: Shiny and Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This wood floor restorer and polisher is fantastic! I was using a wood floor cleaner concentrate that I mixed with water. My floors were looking dull and drab. I searched Amazon and came across this product and decided to give it a try. What a HUGE difference it made!! My wood floors look new. Just make sure you stay off the floors for at least 30 minutes. After several days it still has a high shine. I am extremely pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Nice rich, hard shine.
customer_reviews.text: I used this on new engineered hardwood. I also used the cleaner first. It added a nice shine without being too glossy. I had a small 'oops' scratch that it hid nicely. Tested it hardness with fingernails, dog claws and shoes with no damage seen. These will be my maintenance products from here on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: My floors were dull from 13 years of living on them. Getting house ready to sell and put this on to see what it does. Wow what a difference! While it does not fill gaps or holes (nor should it), it really puts a good shine on them and make them look new from a distance. Very pleased with this product and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: We have engineered wood floors that were already in a house we bought. They obviously had a lot of use/traffic when we bought them. Didn't was to refinished or replace them so I tried this product. I was VERY pleased with the result. The floors look like new and have a nice sheen to them again! Saved a ton of money. I just applied with a cloth floor cleaner. Dried fairly quickly. Easy-peasy.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Ostler

customer_reviews.title: Made my wood floors look great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the reviews. I used it on my dark wood floors and they look great. I have not experienced the hazing in the finish that one review mentioned - it was a concern. I washed and cleaned the floors and then I used the dry pad on my Swifter to spread the product. Very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mando

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a polymer not a wax. It has the appearance and feel of water-based polyurethane. Provides a hard protective finish to wood floors. Very easy to apply and dries fast. Follow instructions. I am a woodworker and am familiar with all types of finishes. No doubt this product will extend the life of a hardwood floor surface finish. Very little odor.
customer_reviews.author: Duey M.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit skeptical at first, however, this is a fantastic product. I put it on in January 2019 and today in August 2019, seven month later, the floors still look like the day it was applied. Amazing product. Easy to apply, drys quickly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Floors never looked better
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. We have been in this house for a number of years and have never polished the floors. One coat, followed by a second coat had our floors looking great. It is holding up well too. Highly recommended for hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: end123

customer_reviews.title: Really good on my wood floors and what a shine!
customer_reviews.text: I have an old ranch house with old wood floors. They are always dingy. I used the Weiman floor cleaner and then I used the polish. Wow! My floors looked wonderful. It lasted about a good week what a wonderful shine the floors had. I have dogs and cats running over them all the time plus we have a ranch and we come in with boots as well. Loved this product!
customer_reviews.author: boot scooting lover

customer_reviews.title: We happy with quality of this product
customer_reviews.text: Worked for us! We have old apartment and we don’t have time to do full finish. After reading reviews - ordered 1 bottle. Floor washed twice with hot water +floor soap. After wiped with clear water. Days were hot so it drying fast. First coat was light and recoated in 3 hours. We happy with results. So will see how long it stays shine.
customer_reviews.author: Madya

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had before & after photos - night & day difference in my hardwood floors. They are so beautiful now - they went from being dull, lifeless and showing a ton of scratches to really shiny, smooth, rich colored floors. A+++++++
customer_reviews.author: spot50

customer_reviews.title: do not use on true wood floors
customer_reviews.text: If you use this product and need to resand floors it cost double to sand due to need to get this product off before they can sand!!!!
customer_reviews.author: nancy harper

customer_reviews.title: I am still in amazement at how AMAZING this product was
customer_reviews.text: I have had the price in the hundreds quoted to me to sand and repair my wood floors. This purchase was my last ditch effort to repair the floors before putting tiles over it as the repair cost quoted was ridiculous. I am still in amazement at how AMAZING this product was. I purchased the cleaner as well. Followed instructions and the floor looks AMAZING. Thank you Weiman and Amazon. I have used the Wieman products for stainless steel and came accross this wood product on Amazon and hoped it would be as good as their other product. It sure was!
customer_reviews.author: MSSAINT

customer_reviews.title: This floor wax live up to what it says.
customer_reviews.text: Your product is amazing. I have tried so many wax products for hardwood floors. That just didn't work. Every month I had to wax my floors. But this wax is the best. This is my second order of your wax. U was so impressed with this floor wax. When I have guess over they ask who did my floors. And I show them what I use. Finally a product that work as it say.
customer_reviews.author: Betty.B

customer_reviews.title: Prep is key...then WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviewers, I cleaned then heck out of my floors before use. I mean I scrubbed the baseboards and edges. Vacuumed and mopped. Then two coats of Weiman’s and my floors are beautiful!!! They were so old and dingy looking I didn’t think there was much that could be done. But they look like new! I am curious to see how long it lasts before I need to do it again. Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen C.

customer_reviews.title: LET IT SHINE!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love your products and find them incredibly effective! My floors looked pretty bad, primarily due to three dogs that do not know how to wear slipper socks, and two grandkids who seem to run circles around us when they visit (which is often)!! The high traffic floor polish is PERFECT for us and so worthwhile. Thank you from very grateful customers! Joy & Randy
customer_reviews.author: Joy Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Works well if you have a good poly base on your floors
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way my floors looked after using. Doesn’t seem to be holding the shine but I think it may be that my floors need to be recoated with real poly before using. Works just as well as rejuvenate (I used both on different areas to see how they compared)
customer_reviews.author: terri b

customer_reviews.title: Not a commodity at all---this is the real answer
customer_reviews.text: Once in a great while today you find a distinctive answer to an everyday problem that actually behaves better than you expect from your experience with traditional products in the same category. It really does go down easily without issues about puddling or missed areas. Dries quickly and just plain looks great. For ages! Thanks for being serious enough about hardwood polish that you set yourself apart in what you sell me!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Weis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great results
customer_reviews.text: Stuff is great. Goes on wicked easy. Just make sure your mop is nice and soaked with the stuff, them really quickly spread it about. First pass helped a little. Dried in ten minutes. Second coat looked essay better. Really nice. Leaves the floor looking so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Knightbaby

customer_reviews.title: Makes floor look new
customer_reviews.text: I first cleaned the floor with Weiman's floor cleaner. The next day I applied the polish and refinisher. The floor looks better than new. Great stuff. I plan to keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Williams

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply. It looks just beautiful. Holds up well.
customer_reviews.text: For my particular floors I needed to put on several applications. It looks just beautiful. Had an on now for well over a month and they are holding up just great. As a matter fact I treated all of the hardwood floors in my home now and I’m very pleased with this product. Would like to see a larger size available. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard R. Giordano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect looking floors
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully. My floors have had a dull luster since they were installed so I wanted to shine them up. I first tried Bona and it just left a milky film on them making them look worse. The Weiman polish has made the beautiful and I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: DC Bargain Hunter

customer_reviews.title: No need to refinish floors now!
customer_reviews.text: Bought house with dark hardwood floors, very dull but otherwise in good shape. Plan was to refinish if needed. Figured I'd try this based on review to get me through next few months. Its amazing, dont need to refinish at all. I did around one area rug bc i didnt want to place a rug over it. Check out the difference! One bottle did about 900 sq feet!
customer_reviews.author: MiaSteele

customer_reviews.title: WORKS AS PROMISED.  GREAT SHINE TO FLOORS
customer_reviews.text: This polish worked better than any other polish I have used. I hasve tried several products but some streaked or dulled by floor rather than giving it a shine. This product works as it says. My hardwood floors have an amazing shine and when the polish is used in conjunction with Weiman's floor cleaner for hardwood floors, the shine is brighter. I will continue to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: shazdehkhanum

customer_reviews.title: No No No!
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy this product! I use this name brand to clean my leather funiture and stainless steell and It is great,so I thought why try floor polish. It absolutely destroyed my nice floors left a thick build up and left floors looking dirty. It's taking a lot of work to get this embedded crap of my floors. Please don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Saybria Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Very, very good floor finish polish
customer_reviews.text: We just moved in to our new house and the floors were ugly as can be from redoing the bathrooms. One coat of this super polish and wham-0, they are beautiful again. Big scratches were anihilated and now shine. I am so impressed with this stuff. It is great.
customer_reviews.author: als300z

customer_reviews.title: Great fix for old floors
customer_reviews.text: This worked really well for me! We just purchased a 100 year old home with original hardwood floors. I can't wait to have them refinished eventually, but in the meantime this really helped. Its easy to miss spots when you're using it and once it dries you can tell. So just pay attention to that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the money! It makes the floors look great- very shiny and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Robitaille

customer_reviews.title: Nice shine restored
customer_reviews.text: My dogs become reluctant to go outdoors when it is hot or raining. It is absolutely amazing what this product does to restore hardwood. The floor installation Company recommended a competitor that just leaves streaks.
customer_reviews.author: A. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Shine as new
customer_reviews.text: I used this about 1 hour after i cleaned the floor. Very easy to use, I poured directly onto the floor and spread section to section. This is the result of 2 coats, 1 hour apart, the right picture is taken 5 hours later. Dog’s nails scratches are still visible but not as bad as before. My floor is laminated fyi.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Ngo

customer_reviews.title: Easy & Affordable
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AWESOME & super easy to use! Between the dogs & the kids & just normal wear, my hardwoods were starting to look dull and scratched up. This was super easy to apply and it made the floors glisten!
customer_reviews.author: Padgett Ward

customer_reviews.title: Old flooring restored
customer_reviews.text: I have very old hardwood floors that date back to the 1920’s. They’ve been refinished at some point but have been hidden under carpet for at least 40 years. The floors looked very dull and ugly after the most recent carpet removal and I was ready to install new flooring. Using this product was my last attempt to keep the old floor. It did a beautiful job! Scratches have been camouflaged and the floor has a beautiful shine now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product Really Shines the Floors
customer_reviews.text: I have a house listed built in 1978 with original hardwood floors. I've tried various products to shine the hardwood floors (not strip and refinish) so they look nice in the photos. None of the products shined them. I tried this product and I squirted it on the floors before an open house and spread it around with a dust mop and they stayed shiny and beautiful. I even took new photos for the listing and am getting showings every other day instead of every other week.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Didnt need special mop. Washed floors with Murphy's. Followed this prodect directions. Absolute improvement. Its not a miracle It wont fix dog damage but gave a nice shine. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: gaw boston

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: First impression is good. Hopefully it will retain the shine!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D

customer_reviews.title: Great shine
customer_reviews.text: Just got new floors put it but I have Dogs and it gets dirty fast and the floor cleaner I use Wasn’t enough to give it a good shine after I bought This I test It in a small area and it looks great I’ve used it for the whole house
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Lasting shine and best coverage
customer_reviews.text: The best hard floor treatment I have used so far.....my pinewood floor is sparkling like NEW.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: bought two of these and two more for another floor...
customer_reviews.text: Saved a lot to have floors fully redone but have to get down on all fours so a lot of elbow grease required. Does a great job as an interim fix.
customer_reviews.author: roxy

product_meta.title: Weiman Wood Floor Polish and Restorer - 32 Ounce - High-Traffic Hardwood Floor, Natural Shine, Removes Scratches, Leaves Protective Layer, Packaging May Vary
feature_bullets: Restore - Micro-filling technology removes scratches while forming a protective scratch resistant layer
Versatile - Can be used on any finished hardwood surface, rejuvenating a shine with no sticky residue
Safe - This "ready to use" formula can be used around kids and pets without causing harm
Recommended - Use with Weiman Hardwood Floor Cleaner to experience long lasting results
Use On - Finished Hardwood Floors Only!
